quality_assessment: Excellent documentation - comprehensive, accurate, and well-structured. All mapped features are thoroughly documented with clear examples and source references.

issues.description: Could add brief mention of agent_count field purpose in MapReduce sessions
issues.fix_suggestion: Add one-line explanation that agent_count tracks currently active parallel agents

positive_aspects: Excellent use of source code references (e.g., src/unified_session/state.rs:117-125)
Clear and accurate JSON examples showing real session structure
Comprehensive coverage of all three mapped features
Well-organized progressive explanation from basics to advanced topics
Practical examples for common use cases
Accurate documentation of bidirectional session-job mapping
Complete coverage of concurrent resume protection with RAII locks
Proper cross-references to related documentation pages
All internal links validated and working
improvement_suggestions: Consider adding a troubleshooting subsection specific to session-related issues (distinct from general troubleshooting)
Could add example of how to inspect session file manually with jq commands
Might benefit from a quick reference table mapping session states to available operations

metadata.validation_focus: Check session tracking, lifecycle states, and resume features are documented
